bibl.title: The Textual History of the Scriptural Quotations in the New Testament: An Examination of Papyrus 46.
bibl.note: P. Chester Beatty II + P. Mich. 222 (= van Haelst 497; LDAB 3011). - 1. Introduction: scriptural quotations in the New Testament and P46. - 2. Quotations with variants in P46 without parallels in the Septuagint. - 3. Quotations with variants in P46 with parallels in the Septuagint. - 4. Detailed discussion of selected passages. - 5. Conclusions: the textual history of scriptural quotations in the New Testament - some insights and an overview.

bibl.title: Textual History and the Reception of Scripture in Early Christianity / Textgeschichte und Schriftrezeption im frühen Christentum

bibl.seg: Johannes de Vries, The Textual History of the Scriptural Quotations in the New Testament: An Examination of Papyrus 46.

Johannes de Vries & Martin Karrer (edd.), Textual History and the Reception of Scripture in Early Christianity / Textgeschichte und Schriftrezeption im frühen Christentum = Society of Biblical Literature. Septuagint and Cognate Studies. 60 (Atlanta, GA, 2013) pp. 79-92.

P. Chester Beatty II + P. Mich. 222 (= van Haelst 497; LDAB 3011). - 1. Introduction: scriptural quotations in the New Testament and P46. - 2. Quotations with variants in P46 without parallels in the Septuagint. - 3. Quotations with variants in P46 with parallels in the Septuagint. - 4. Detailed discussion of selected passages. - 5. Conclusions: the textual history of scriptural quotations in the New Testament - some insights and an overview.
